mapper.insert: insert into pay (text_money, value_money, tax, comment, payer_id, payee_id, create_time) values (#{textMoney}, #{valueMoney}, #{tax}, #{comment}, #{payerId}, #{payeeId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select a.id as id, a.TEXT_MONEY as textMoney, a.VALUE_MONEY as valueMoney, a.TAX as tax, a.COMMENT as comment, a.CREATE_TIME as createTime, a.PAYER_ID as payerId, a.PAYEE_ID as payeeId, b.name as payerName, c.NAME as payeeName from pay a,user b,user c where 1=1 and a.PAYER_ID = b.ID and a.PAYEE_ID = c.ID
AND b.RNAME like '%${payerRname}%'
AND c.RNAME like '%${payeeRname}%'
order by a.create_time desc limit ${start},${limit}
